#include<stdio.h>
int compare(const void *a,const void*b)
{return (*(int*)a-*(int*)b);
}
int main()
{
int t,n;int c[100]={0};int i=0;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d",&n);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)scanf("%d",&c[i]);
qsort(c,n,sizeof(int),compare);
if(c[0]!=c[1]){printf("%d\n",c[0]);}
else if(c[0]==c[1]){
for(i=1;i<=n-2;i++){if((c[i]!=c[i+1])&&(c[i]!=c[i-1])){break;}}
printf("%d\n",c[i]);
}
else if(c[n-2]!=c[n-1]){printf("%d\n",c[n-1]);}
}
return 0;
}
